name: Addictive Match
description:
A new twist to memory card game!

Find and Match identical cards!

This game is a test of your memory and luck.

Click on one card and then click on the others to find a pair of matching cards!

5 Power Ups to use.
6 type of cards to unlock!
Heart: game over if you run out of hearts!
Coins: the more coins you get, the higher you score!
Silver:
Reveal: shows you where the matching card is!
Share your score on twitter!
